inclusion.criterion: High-risk of recurrence according to both the clinical-pathological criteria and the 70-gene signature
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hormone receptor-positive disease (estrogen receptor-positive, progesterone receptor-positive, or both)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine clearance at least 50 mL/min OR creatinine up to 1.5 times upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALT and AST up to 2.5 times ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alkaline phosphatase up to 2.5 times ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal echocardiogram (ECHO) compatible with chemotherapy treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of documented congestive heart failure
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of transmural infarction on ECG
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Poorly controlled hypertension (e.g., systolic blood pressure [BP] > 180 mm Hg or diastolic BP > 100 mm Hg)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Symptomatic coronary artery disease or a myocardial infarction within the past 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other risk factors that contraindicate the use of anthracycline-based chemotherapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.
